role.argrole: thing arg0 steams until it is done

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DNP (ADJP (JJ 传统)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 米粉))) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 比较)) (VP (VA 粗))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 而且)) (PP-PRP (P 因为) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (LCP-TMP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VRD (VV 压制) (VA 好)) (AS 了))) (LC 後)) (PU ，) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VP (VV 放入) (LCP-OBJ (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 大)) (NP (NN 锅))) (NP (NN 开水))) (LC 中))) (VP (VV 煮熟))))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 所以)) (ADVP (AD 又)) (VP (VV 叫) (NP-OBJ (PU 「) (NN 水粉) (PU 」)))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 压制 好 了 後
